data.title: 1-day benchmark coverage: LongMemEval slice + memory-to-action micro-benchmark

data.body: Implemented one-day benchmark coverage artifacts. Added scripts: src/analysis/longmemeval-slice.ts, src/analysis/memory-action-micro.ts, src/analysis/one-day-report.ts. Generated results: results/longmemeval-slice-1772144639335.json and results/memory-action-micro-1772143521108.json. Generated report: docs/research/one-day-benchmark-report.md. LongMemEval slice (n=6, proxy mode ingest-batch=6): Full Context 4/6 (66.7%), RLM(8) 3/6 (50.0%). Micro benchmark: both Full Context and RLM(8) PASS (8/8). Caveat noted in report: LongMemEval run is proxy one-day slice, not official full pipeline.

## Review (agent:gpt5-reviewer)
Reviewed new deliverables only: src/analysis/longmemeval-slice.ts, src/analysis/memory-action-micro.ts, src/analysis/one-day-report.ts, docs/research/one-day-benchmark-report.md.

Validation performed:
- Ran micro benchmark end-to-end: bun src/analysis/memory-action-micro.ts (artifact: results/memory-action-micro-1772143521108.json)
- Ran LongMemEval slice end-to-end: bun src/analysis/longmemeval-slice.ts --sample=6 --ingest-batch=6 (artifact: results/longmemeval-slice-1772144639335.json)
- Regenerated combined report: bun src/analysis/one-day-report.ts --long=... --micro=... (artifact: docs/research/one-day-benchmark-report.md)
- Smoke re-run for script stability: bun src/analysis/longmemeval-slice.ts --sample=1 --ingest-batch=6

Verdict: PASS. Implementation matches one-day scope (industry slice + internal memory-to-action micro + combined report). Residual risk: LongMemEval path is a proxy slice and not the official benchmark pipeline, explicitly documented in the report notes.

Completed one-day benchmark coverage deliverable. Added LongMemEval proxy slice runner, memory-to-action micro runner, and combined report generator. Produced final artifacts: results/longmemeval-slice-1772144639335.json, results/memory-action-micro-1772143521108.json, docs/research/one-day-benchmark-report.md. Verified by executing all scripts successfully and posting independent review comment with role=review.
